original: simpl. intros net net' tr H. inversion H as [H_deliver | H_input]. - destruct H_deliver as [net net' p xs ys out d l]. destruct H1 as [H_nw H_handlers H_net']. injection H_nw as nw_eq. rewrite nw_eq in *. rewrite H_net'. repeat split; auto. - destruct H_input as [h inp d l]. destruct H1 as [H_inph H_net']. rewrite H_net'. repeat split; auto.
